alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Somerset, Wicomico, northwestern Worcester and Dorchester Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms 10 miles north of Deal Island, or 17 miles northwest of Princess Anne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Cambridge, Fruitland, Princess Anne, Hurlock, University Of Maryland Eastern Shore, Salisbury University, Delmar, Hebron, Sharptown, Secretary, Vienna, Westover, Parsonsburg, Newark, Deal Island, Pittsville, Willards, East New Market and Mardela Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
